author: wn.com
title: Eat Local Challenge Celebrates Commitment to Local Food (Oberlin College)
text: ( Source : Oberlin College ) A chef in Stevenson Dining Hall presents herb-marinated pork loin from New Creation Farms in Chardon, Ohio , topped with heirloom tomato and plum relish. Photo By Walter Novak Produce often travels 1, 500 miles
